it.apice.sapere.api.space.match.functions
Interface MatchFunctRegistry<FunctionType>

Type Parameters:
FunctionType - The basic type for a custom function usable by the engine
All Known Implementing Classes:
MatchFunctRegistryImpl
public interface MatchFunctRegistry<FunctionType>

This interface models a service which is capable of registering custom functions to be used by SPARQL and SPARUL queries.

Further information on how to deal with ARQ Custom Functions can be found at http://jena.sourceforge.net/ARQ/library-function.html.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary

           Creates a new URI which will be used to identified a registered function.

Method Detail

buildFunctionURI

URI buildFunctionURI(String fname)

Creates a new URI which will be used to identified a registered function.

This is an utility method meant to be used to provide a standard namespace for all SAPERE custom functions.

Parameters:
fname - The name of the function to be registered
Returns:
The corresponding URI

buildFunctionURI

URI buildFunctionURI(String folder,
                     String fname)

Creates a new URI which will be used to identified a registered function.

This is an utility method meant to be used to provide a standard namespace for all SAPERE custom functions.

Parameters:
fname - The name of the function to be registered
folder - A sub-folder to be used to organize some function in sub-namespaces
Returns:
The corresponding URI

register

void register(URI uri,
              Class<? extends FunctionType> function)

Registers a new Custom Function.

Parameters:
uri - The identifier of the function (that should be used for invocation)
function - The function to be used

cancel

void cancel(URI uri)

Cancels the registration of the specified function.

Parameters:
uri - The identifier of the function

getKnownFunctionsURIs

URI[] getKnownFunctionsURIs()

Retrieves a list of all custom functions that has been registered.

Returns:
A list of all registered custom functions' identifiers
